titleStmt.title: The form of His Majesties coronation-feast to be solemnized and kept at Westminster-Hall up on the 23. of April 1661

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A84714 of text R210270 in the English Short Title Catalog (Thomason 669.f.27[15]). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread
